mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO inventoryresults(INVENTORYRESULTS_ID, INVENTORYPLAN_ID, FILENAME, TYPEASSETS, PRICE, PURCHASETIME, USEDEPARTMENT, BARCODE, RESULT, ROWINDEX, PRINCIPAL, RFIDCD, CREATEBY, CREATEON, MODIFYBY, MODIFYON, OWNER, STATUS, TENANTID) values
(#{item.inventoryresults_id}, #{item.inventoryplan_id}, #{item.filename}, #{item.typeassets}, #{item.price}, #{item.purchasetime}, #{item.usedepartment}, #{item.barcode}, #{item.result}, #{item.rowindex}, #{item.principal}, #{item.rfidcd}, #{item.createby}, #{item.createon}, #{item.modifyby}, #{item.modifyon}, #{item.owner}, #{item.status}, #{item.tenantid})
